data.message: Can the powers that be on Facebook tell me why I am banned from certain pages just because I do not share the views.  For instance, if I am a British Republican, why cant I be allowed to express my views in a polite, albeit controversial manner, on a Monarchy Page.  Facebook - please allow democracy - otherwise what is the point of exchanging views.  Do you want all Facebook followers to be sheep?

replies.message: Pages & Groups can ban you if they want to - it's their page and if they don't like what you have to say, then that's their prerogative.
